trans-unit.source: Represents a Windows control that enables the user to select a date using a visual monthly calendar display.
trans-unit.target: 表示一个 Windows 控件，该控件使用户能够使用可视月历显示来选择日期。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> control allows the user to select a date using a visual display.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>控件允许用户选择使用以可视方式显示的日期。

trans-unit.source: You can limit the date and times that can be selected by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MinDate%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxDate%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 你可以限制日期和时间，可以通过设置选择<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MinDate%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxDate%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: You can change the look of the calendar portion of the control by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TitleBackColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TitleForeColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TrailingForeColor%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过设置更改控件的日历部分的查找范围<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TitleBackColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TitleForeColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TrailingForeColor%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker> control only supports Gregorian calendars.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker>控件仅支持公历日历。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker> control only supports Gregorian calendars.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker>控件仅支持公历日历。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> control is drawn by the operating system, so the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.Paint> event is never raised.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>控件绘制由操作系统，因此<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.Paint>永远不会引发事件。

trans-unit.source: If you need to provide a customized look to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> control, you should override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPrint%2A> method, call the base implementation of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPrint%2A>, and then perform custom painting.
trans-unit.target: 如果你需要提供自定义信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>控件，应重写<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPrint%2A>方法，调用基实现的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPrint%2A>，然后执行自定义绘制。

trans-unit.source: If you need custom date formatting and a selection limited to just one date, you might consider using a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker> control instead of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>.
trans-unit.target: 如果你需要自定义日期格式设置和选择限制为只用于一个日期，则可以考虑使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker>而不是控制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>。

trans-unit.source: Using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker> eliminates much of the need for validating date/time values.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker>措施来减少你需要验证日期/时间值。

trans-unit.source: For more information on month calendar controls, see [Month Calendar Control Reference](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178863).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息月月历控件，请参阅[月日历控件引用](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178863)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays a form containing a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> control that displays one calendar year.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例显示一个窗体包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>显示一个日历年的控件。

trans-unit.source: The example demonstrates setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TitleBackColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TitleForeColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.CalendarDimensions%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TrailingForeColor%2A> properties to customize the look of the calendar control.
trans-unit.target: 该示例演示了如何设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TitleBackColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TitleForeColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.CalendarDimensions%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TrailingForeColor%2A>可自定义日历控件的外观属性。

trans-unit.source: Other properties such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.AnnuallyBoldedDates%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.BoldedDates%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MonthlyBoldedDates%2A> are set to customize which dates are bold.
trans-unit.target: 其他属性，如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.AnnuallyBoldedDates%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.BoldedDates%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MonthlyBoldedDates%2A>设置为自定义的日期将以粗体显示。

trans-unit.source: The example also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.FirstDayOfWeek%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxDate%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MinDate%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A> properties to change the calendar format.
trans-unit.target: 该示例还将<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.FirstDayOfWeek%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxDate%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MinDate%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A>属性来更改日历格式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateSelected> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateChanged> events are also handled and their status is displayed on the form.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateSelected>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateChanged>还处理事件，并在窗体上显示其状态。

trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.%23ctor%2A>构造函数创建一个新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>。

trans-unit.target: 下表显示了 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> 类的某个实例的初始属性值。

trans-unit.target: 项

trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Today's date.
trans-unit.target: 今天的日期。

trans-unit.source: Today's date.
trans-unit.target: 今天的日期。

trans-unit.target: 其他属性，如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.AnnuallyBoldedDates%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.BoldedDates%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MonthlyBoldedDates%2A>设置为自定义的日期将以粗体显示。

trans-unit.source: The example also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.FirstDayOfWeek%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxDate%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MinDate%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A> properties to change the calendar format.
trans-unit.target: 该示例还将<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.FirstDayOfWeek%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxDate%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MinDate%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A>属性来更改日历格式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateSelected> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateChanged> events are also handled and their status is displayed on the form.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateSelected>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateChanged>还处理事件，并在窗体上显示其状态。

trans-unit.source: The date to be displayed in bold.
trans-unit.target: 要以粗体显示的日期。

trans-unit.source: Adds a day that is displayed in bold on an annual basis in the month calendar.
trans-unit.target: 在月历中，在一年的基础上添加一个以粗体显示的日期。

trans-unit.source: You must call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.UpdateBoldedDates%2A> method afterward to update the display.
trans-unit.target: 必须调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.UpdateBoldedDates%2A>方法以更新显示。

trans-unit.source: To add multiple dates in a single assignment, you can assign an array of <xref:System.DateTime> objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.AnnuallyBoldedDates%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要在一次分配中添加多个日期，你可以分配的数组<xref:System.DateTime>对象添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.AnnuallyBoldedDates%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The date to be displayed in bold.
trans-unit.target: 要以粗体显示的日期。

trans-unit.source: Adds a day to be displayed in bold in the month calendar.
trans-unit.target: 在月历中添加以粗体显示的日期。

trans-unit.source: You must call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.UpdateBoldedDates%2A> method afterward to update the display.
trans-unit.target: 必须调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.UpdateBoldedDates%2A>方法以更新显示。

trans-unit.source: To add multiple dates in a single assignment, you can assign an array of <xref:System.DateTime> objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.BoldedDates%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要在一次分配中添加多个日期，你可以分配的数组<xref:System.DateTime>对象添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.BoldedDates%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.AddBoldedDate%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.UpdateBoldedDates%2A> methods to mark and display in a bold font dates read from a file.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.AddBoldedDate%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.UpdateBoldedDates%2A>标记和在从文件读取的日期加粗字体中显示的方法。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> control, named `monthCalendar1`, has been added to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> and that this method is placed within the form and called from it.
trans-unit.target: 此示例需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>控件，名为`monthCalendar1`，已添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>与，放置在窗体中并从其调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: The date to be displayed in bold.
trans-unit.target: 要以粗体显示的日期。

trans-unit.source: Adds a day that is displayed in bold on a monthly basis in the month calendar.
trans-unit.target: 在月历中，在每月的基础上添加一个以粗体显示的日期。

trans-unit.source: You must call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.UpdateBoldedDates%2A> method afterward to update the display.
trans-unit.target: 必须调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.UpdateBoldedDates%2A>方法以更新显示。

trans-unit.source: To add multiple dates in a single assignment, you can assign an array of <xref:System.DateTime> objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MonthlyBoldedDates%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要在一次分配中添加多个日期，你可以分配的数组<xref:System.DateTime>对象添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MonthlyBoldedDates%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the array of <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> objects that determines which annual days are displayed in bold.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 对象的数组，确定一年中要以粗体显示的日期。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 对象数组。

trans-unit.source: Using this property, you can assign an array of annual bold dates.
trans-unit.target: 使用此属性，你可以分配每年以粗体显示日期的数组。

trans-unit.source: When you assign an array of dates, the existing dates are first cleared.
trans-unit.target: 当分配的日期数组时，将首先会清除现有的日期。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays a form containing a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> control that displays one calendar year.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例显示一个窗体包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>显示一个日历年的控件。

trans-unit.source: The example demonstrates setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TitleBackColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TitleForeColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.CalendarDimensions%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TrailingForeColor%2A> properties to customize the look of the calendar control.
trans-unit.target: 该示例演示了如何设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TitleBackColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TitleForeColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.CalendarDimensions%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TrailingForeColor%2A>可自定义日历控件的外观属性。

trans-unit.source: Other properties such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.AnnuallyBoldedDates%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.BoldedDates%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MonthlyBoldedDates%2A> are set to customize which dates are bold.
trans-unit.target: 其他属性，如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.AnnuallyBoldedDates%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.BoldedDates%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MonthlyBoldedDates%2A>设置为自定义的日期将以粗体显示。

trans-unit.source: The example also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.FirstDayOfWeek%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxDate%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MinDate%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A> properties to change the calendar format.
trans-unit.target: 该示例还将<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.FirstDayOfWeek%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxDate%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MinDate%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A>属性来更改日历格式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateSelected> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateChanged> events are also handled and their status is displayed on the form.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateSelected>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateChanged>还处理事件，并在窗体上显示其状态。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color for the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置控件的背景色。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that represents the background color of the control.
trans-unit.target: 表示控件背景色的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultBackColor" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 默认为 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultBackColor" /> 属性的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> property does not support transparent colors unless the `SupportsTransparentBackColor` value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=nameWithType> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>属性不支持透明的颜色，除非`SupportsTransparentBackColor`值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=nameWithType>设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> property is an ambient property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>属性是一个环境属性。

trans-unit.source: An ambient property is a control property that, if not set, is retrieved from the parent control.
trans-unit.target: 环境属性是控件属性，如果未设置，从父控件检索。

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> will have the same <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> as its parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> by default.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>都不具有相同<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>作为其父<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>默认情况下。

trans-unit.source: For more information about ambient properties, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties> class or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 有关环境属性的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties>类或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>类概述。

trans-unit.source: Starting with Windows Vista and depending on the theme, setting this property might not change the appearance of the calendar.
trans-unit.target: 启动与 Windows Vista 和具体取决于主题，设置此属性可能不更改的外观的日历。

trans-unit.source: For example, if Windows is set to use the Aero theme, setting this property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果 Windows 设置为使用 Aero 主题，设置此属性无效。

trans-unit.source: This is because an updated version of the calendar is rendered with an appearance that is derived at run time from the current operating system theme.
trans-unit.target: 这是因为日历的更新的版本呈现在运行时派生自当前的操作系统主题的外观。

trans-unit.source: If you want to use this property and enable the earlier version of the calendar, you can disable visual styles for your application.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要使用此属性并启用日历的早期版本，你可以为你的应用程序禁用视觉样式。

trans-unit.source: Disabling visual styles might affect the appearance and behavior of other controls in your application.
trans-unit.target: 禁用视觉样式可能会影响的外观和应用程序中其他控件的行为。

trans-unit.source: To disable visual styles in Visual Basic, open the Project Designer and uncheck the **Enable XP visual styles** check box.
trans-unit.target: 若要禁用在 Visual Basic 中的视觉样式，打开项目设计器，并取消选中**启用 XP 视觉样式**复选框。

trans-unit.source: To disable visual styles in C#, open Program.cs and comment out `Application.EnableVisualStyles();`.
trans-unit.target: 若要禁用在 C# 中的视觉样式，打开 Program.cs，并注释掉`Application.EnableVisualStyles();`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A> of the controls to the default system colors.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>的默认系统颜色的控件。

trans-unit.source: The code recursively calls itself if the control has any child controls.
trans-unit.target: 如果控件具有任何子控件，则代码以递归方式调用自身。

trans-unit.source: This code example requires that you have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> with at least one child control; however, a child container control, like a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>, with its own child control(s) would better demonstrate the recursion.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例要求你拥有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>与至少一个子控件; 但是，子容器控制，如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>，与它自己的子控件将更好地演示递归。

trans-unit.source: When overriding the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor" /> property in a derived class, use the base class's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor" /> property to extend the base implementation.
trans-unit.target: 在重写<see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor" />属性在派生类中，使用基类的<see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor" />属性来扩展的基实现。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, you must provide all the implementation.
trans-unit.target: 否则，你必须提供所有实现。

trans-unit.source: You are not required to override both the <see langword="get" /> and <see langword="set" /> accessors of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor" /> property; you can override only one if needed.
trans-unit.target: 你无需重写二者，<see langword="get" />和<see langword="set" />访问器<see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor" />属性; 你可以根据需要重写只有一个。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background image for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar" />
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar" /> 的背景图像

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> that is the background image for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />，<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar" /> 控件的背景图像。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: 此属性与此类无关。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.BackgroundImage" /> property changes.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the array of <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> objects that determines which nonrecurring dates are displayed in bold.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 对象的数组，确定要以粗体显示的非周期性日期。

trans-unit.source: The array of bold dates.
trans-unit.target: 以粗体显示的日期的数组。

trans-unit.source: Using this property, you can assign an array of bold dates.
trans-unit.target: 使用此属性，你可以分配以粗体显示日期的数组。

trans-unit.source: When you assign an array of dates, the existing dates are first cleared.
trans-unit.target: 当分配的日期数组时，将首先会清除现有的日期。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays a form containing a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> control that displays one calendar year.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例显示一个窗体包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>显示一个日历年的控件。

trans-unit.source: The example demonstrates setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TitleBackColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TitleForeColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.CalendarDimensions%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TrailingForeColor%2A> properties to customize the look of the calendar control.
trans-unit.target: 该示例演示了如何设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TitleBackColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TitleForeColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.CalendarDimensions%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TrailingForeColor%2A>可自定义日历控件的外观属性。

trans-unit.source: Other properties such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.AnnuallyBoldedDates%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.BoldedDates%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MonthlyBoldedDates%2A> are set to customize which dates are bold.
trans-unit.target: 其他属性，如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.AnnuallyBoldedDates%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.BoldedDates%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MonthlyBoldedDates%2A>设置为自定义的日期将以粗体显示。

trans-unit.source: The example also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.FirstDayOfWeek%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxDate%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MinDate%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A> properties to change the calendar format.
trans-unit.target: 该示例还将<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.FirstDayOfWeek%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxDate%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MinDate%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A>属性来更改日历格式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateSelected> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateChanged> events are also handled and their status is displayed on the form.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateSelected>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateChanged>还处理事件，并在窗体上显示其状态。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of columns and rows of months displayed.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置所显示月份的列数和行数。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> with the number of columns and rows to use to display the calendar.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />，带有用于显示日历的列数和行数。

trans-unit.source: Only one calendar year is displayed at a time, and the maximum number of months that can be displayed is 12.
trans-unit.target: 只有一个日历年会显示一次，并最大的可显示的月数为 12。

trans-unit.source: Valid combinations of columns and rows make a maximum product of 12; for values greater than 12, the display is modified on a best-fit basis.
trans-unit.target: 有效组合的列和行进行 12; 最大产品对于值大于 12，显示修改在最佳的基础上。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> instance returned by this method provides correct values for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Help>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Name>, and <System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Role> properties.

trans-unit.source: The new value for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Role> property is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleRole.Table?displayProperty=nameWithType>, the new value for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Name> property is the current selection, and the new default value for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Help> property is the type name.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> is only available in applications that are recompiled to target the .NET Framework 4.7.1 or that opt in to the .NET Framework accessibility features added in the .NET Framework 4.7.1 by using a compatibility switch.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the Windows Forms section in [Retargeting Changes for Migration from .NET Framework 4.7 to 4.7.1](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/retargeting/4.7-4.7.1.md#windows-forms).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateChanged> event occurs during any date selection, whether by mouse, keyboard, or code.

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode
trans-unit.target: Associated enumeration: F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 <see langword="true" />；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar" />.
trans-unit.target: 释放由 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar" /> 使用的所有资源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法称为由公共`Dispose()`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> references.
trans-unit.target: 当`disposing`参数为 true 时，此方法释放由任何托管对象持有的全部资源此<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>引用。

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Dispose" /> can be called multiple times by other objects.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Dispose" /> 可以由其他对象多次调用。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" /> be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to <see langword="Dispose" />.
trans-unit.target: 在重写<see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />请注意不要引用已释放的以前调用中的对象<see langword="Dispose" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to implement <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何实现详细信息<see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about <see langword="Dispose" /> and <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息<see langword="Dispose" />和<see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control should redraw its surface using a secondary buffer.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示控件是否应使用次要缓冲区重绘其图面。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the control should use a secondary buffer to redraw; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果控件应使用次要缓冲区进行重绘则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DoubleBuffered%2A> property has no effect on the appearance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> control.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DoubleBuffered%2A>属性不起作用的外观<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>控件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user double-clicks the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 当用户双击 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar" /> 控件时发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> control sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles.StandardClick> bit flag to `false`, so the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> will not raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DoubleClick> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>控件将设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles.StandardClick>位标志设为`false`，因此<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>不会引发<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DoubleClick>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the first day of the week as displayed in the month calendar.
trans-unit.target: 根据月历中的显示获取或设置一周中的第一天。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Day" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Day" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.Day.Default" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.Day.Default" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays a form containing a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> control that displays one calendar year.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例显示一个窗体包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>显示一个日历年的控件。

trans-unit.source: The example demonstrates setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TitleBackColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TitleForeColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.CalendarDimensions%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TrailingForeColor%2A> properties to customize the look of the calendar control.
trans-unit.target: 该示例演示了如何设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TitleBackColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TitleForeColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.CalendarDimensions%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TrailingForeColor%2A>可自定义日历控件的外观属性。

trans-unit.source: Other properties such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.AnnuallyBoldedDates%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.BoldedDates%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MonthlyBoldedDates%2A> are set to customize which dates are bold.
trans-unit.target: 其他属性，如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.AnnuallyBoldedDates%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.BoldedDates%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MonthlyBoldedDates%2A>设置为自定义的日期将以粗体显示。

trans-unit.source: The example also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.FirstDayOfWeek%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxDate%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MinDate%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A> properties to change the calendar format.
trans-unit.target: 该示例还将<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.FirstDayOfWeek%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxDate%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MinDate%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A>属性来更改日历格式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateSelected> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateChanged> events are also handled and their status is displayed on the form.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateSelected>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateChanged>还处理事件，并在窗体上显示其状态。

trans-unit.source: The assigned value is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Day" /> enumeration members.
trans-unit.target: 所分配的值不是 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Day" /> 枚举成员之一。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the foreground color of the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置控件的前景色。

trans-unit.source: The foreground <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控件的前景 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultForeColor" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 默认为 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultForeColor" /> 属性的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A> property is an ambient property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>属性是一个环境属性。

trans-unit.source: An ambient property is a control property that, if not set, is retrieved from the parent control.
trans-unit.target: 环境属性是控件属性，如果未设置，从父控件检索。

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> will have the same <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> as its parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> by default.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>都不具有相同<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>作为其父<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>默认情况下。

trans-unit.source: For more information about ambient properties, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties> class or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 有关环境属性的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties>类或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>类概述。

trans-unit.source: Starting with Windows Vista and depending on the theme, setting this property might not change the appearance of the calendar.
trans-unit.target: 启动与 Windows Vista 和具体取决于主题，设置此属性可能不更改的外观的日历。

trans-unit.source: For example, if Windows is set to use the Aero theme, setting this property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果 Windows 设置为使用 Aero 主题，设置此属性无效。

trans-unit.source: This is because an updated version of the calendar is rendered with an appearance that is derived at run time from the current operating system theme.
trans-unit.target: 这是因为日历的更新的版本呈现在运行时派生自当前的操作系统主题的外观。

trans-unit.source: If you want to use this property and enable the earlier version of the calendar, you can disable visual styles for your application.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要使用此属性并启用日历的早期版本，你可以为你的应用程序禁用视觉样式。

trans-unit.source: Disabling visual styles might affect the appearance and behavior of other controls in your application.
trans-unit.target: 禁用视觉样式可能会影响的外观和应用程序中其他控件的行为。

trans-unit.source: To disable visual styles in Visual Basic, open the Project Designer and uncheck the **Enable XP visual styles** check box.
trans-unit.target: 若要禁用在 Visual Basic 中的视觉样式，打开项目设计器，并取消选中**启用 XP 视觉样式**复选框。

trans-unit.source: To disable visual styles in C#, open Program.cs and comment out `Application.EnableVisualStyles();`.
trans-unit.target: 若要禁用在 C# 中的视觉样式，打开 Program.cs，并注释掉`Application.EnableVisualStyles();`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A> of the controls to the default system colors.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>的默认系统颜色的控件。

trans-unit.source: The code recursively calls itself if the control has any child controls.
trans-unit.target: 如果控件具有任何子控件，则代码以递归方式调用自身。

trans-unit.source: This code example requires that you have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> with at least one child control; however, a child container control, like a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>, with its own child control(s) would better demonstrate the recursion.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例要求你拥有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>与至少一个子控件; 但是，子容器控制，如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>，与它自己的子控件将更好地演示递归。

trans-unit.source: When overriding the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor" /> property in a derived class, use the base class's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor" /> property to extend the base implementation.
trans-unit.target: 在重写<see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor" />属性在派生类中，使用基类的<see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor" />属性来扩展的基实现。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, you must provide all the implementation.
trans-unit.target: 否则，你必须提供所有实现。

trans-unit.source: You are not required to override both the <see langword="get" /> and <see langword="set" /> accessors of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor" /> property; you can override only one if needed.
trans-unit.target: 你无需重写二者，<see langword="get" />和<see langword="set" />访问器<see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor" />属性; 你可以根据需要重写只有一个。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to retrieve only the dates that are fully contained in displayed months; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 只检索完全包含在所显示月份中的日期，则为 <see langword="true" />，否则，为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves date information that represents the low and high limits of the displayed dates of the control.
trans-unit.target: 检索表示控件所显示日期上下限的日期信息。

trans-unit.source: The begin and end dates of the displayed calendar.
trans-unit.target: 所显示日历的开始和结束日期。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.GetDisplayRange%2A> method returns a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionRange%2A> that contains the begin and end dates displayed in the current view of the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.GetDisplayRange%2A>方法返回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionRange%2A>包含控件的当前视图中显示的开始和结束日期。

trans-unit.source: You can modify the returned range based on the value you specify for the `visible` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 你可以修改返回为指定的值的范围`visible`参数。

trans-unit.source: By specifying `false`, you can retrieve all dates displayed on the control; specifying `true` retrieves only those dates that are part of fully displayed months.
trans-unit.target: 通过指定`false`，你可以检索显示在控件; 上的所有日期指定`true`检索属于完全显示的月份的日期。

trans-unit.source: Determines which element of the calendar is at a specified location.
trans-unit.target: 确定位于指定位置的日历元素。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> containing the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Point.X" /> and <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Point.Y" /> coordinates of the point to be hit tested.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />，包含要进行点击测试的点的 <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Point.X" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Point.Y" /> 坐标。

trans-unit.source: Returns an object with information on which portion of a month calendar control is at a location specified by a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个对象，该对象带有关于月历控件的哪个部分位于由 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> 指定的位置的信息。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.HitTestInfo" /> that contains information about the specified point on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.HitTestInfo" />，其中包含有关 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar" /> 上的指定点的信息。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Point.X" /> coordinate of the point to be hit tested.
trans-unit.target: 要进行点击测试的点的 <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Point.X" /> 坐标。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Point.Y" /> coordinate of the point to be hit tested.
trans-unit.target: 要进行点击测试的点的 <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Point.Y" /> 坐标。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.HitTestInfo" /> with information on which portion of a month calendar control is at a specified x- and y-coordinate.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.HitTestInfo" />，包含有关月历控件的哪个部分位于指定的 x 和 y 坐标处的信息。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.HitTestInfo" /> that contains information about the specified point on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.HitTestInfo" />，其中包含有关 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar" /> 上的指定点的信息。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Input Method Editor (IME) mode supported by this control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此控件所支持的输入法编辑器 (IME) 模式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: 此属性与此类无关。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.ImeMode" /> property has changed.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.ImeMode" /> 属性更改后发生。

trans-unit.source: One of the Keys values.
trans-unit.target: 一个键值。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified key is a regular input key or a special key that requires preprocessing.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定的键是常规输入键还是需要预处理的特殊键。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified key is a regular input key; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的键是常规输入键，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum allowable date.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置允许的最大日期。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> representing the maximum allowable date.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />，表示允许的最大日期。

trans-unit.source: The default is 12/31/9998.
The following code example displays a form containing a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> control that displays one calendar year.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例显示一个窗体包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>显示一个日历年的控件。

trans-unit.source: The example demonstrates setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TitleBackColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TitleForeColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.CalendarDimensions%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TrailingForeColor%2A> properties to customize the look of the calendar control.
trans-unit.target: 该示例演示了如何设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TitleBackColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TitleForeColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.CalendarDimensions%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TrailingForeColor%2A>可自定义日历控件的外观属性。

trans-unit.source: Other properties such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.AnnuallyBoldedDates%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.BoldedDates%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MonthlyBoldedDates%2A> are set to customize which dates are bold.
trans-unit.target: 其他属性，如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.AnnuallyBoldedDates%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.BoldedDates%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MonthlyBoldedDates%2A>设置为自定义的日期将以粗体显示。

trans-unit.source: The example also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.FirstDayOfWeek%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxDate%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MinDate%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A> properties to change the calendar format.
trans-unit.target: 该示例还将<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.FirstDayOfWeek%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxDate%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MinDate%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A>属性来更改日历格式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateSelected> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateChanged> events are also handled and their status is displayed on the form.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateSelected>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateChanged>还处理事件，并在窗体上显示其状态。

trans-unit.source: The value is less than the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MinDate" />.
trans-unit.target: 值小于 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MinDate" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum number of days that can be selected in a month calendar control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置月历控件中可选择的最大天数。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of days that you can select.
trans-unit.target: 您可以选择的最大天数。

trans-unit.source: The default is 7.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 7。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property does not effect the current selection range.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性不会影响当前的选择范围。

trans-unit.source: It is important to remember that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A> property represents the number of days in the selection, not the difference between <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 务必记住<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A>属性表示所选内容，不之间的差异的最大天数<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For example, if <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A> is 7 (the default), <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A> can be no more than six days apart.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A>为 7 （默认值）、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A>之间能不能超过六天。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays a form containing a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> control that displays one calendar year.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例显示一个窗体包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>显示一个日历年的控件。

trans-unit.source: The example demonstrates setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TitleBackColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TitleForeColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.CalendarDimensions%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TrailingForeColor%2A> properties to customize the look of the calendar control.
trans-unit.target: 该示例演示了如何设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TitleBackColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TitleForeColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.CalendarDimensions%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TrailingForeColor%2A>可自定义日历控件的外观属性。

trans-unit.source: Other properties such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.AnnuallyBoldedDates%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.BoldedDates%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MonthlyBoldedDates%2A> are set to customize which dates are bold.
trans-unit.target: 其他属性，如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.AnnuallyBoldedDates%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.BoldedDates%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MonthlyBoldedDates%2A>设置为自定义的日期将以粗体显示。

trans-unit.source: The example also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.FirstDayOfWeek%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxDate%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MinDate%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A> properties to change the calendar format.
trans-unit.target: 该示例还将<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.FirstDayOfWeek%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxDate%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MinDate%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A>属性来更改日历格式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateSelected> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateChanged> events are also handled and their status is displayed on the form.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateSelected>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateChanged>还处理事件，并在窗体上显示其状态。

trans-unit.source: The value is less than 1.
trans-unit.target: 值小于 1。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount" /> cannot be set.
trans-unit.target: 无法设置 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the minimum allowable date.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置允许的最小日期。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> representing the minimum allowable date.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />，表示允许的最小日期。

trans-unit.source: The default is 01/01/1753.

Gets or sets the array of <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> objects that determine which monthly days to bold.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 对象的数组，确定每月要用粗体显示的日期。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 对象数组。

trans-unit.source: Using this property, you assign an array of monthly bold dates.
trans-unit.target: 使用此属性，将分配一个数组的每月中粗体日期。

trans-unit.source: When you assign an array of dates, any preexisting dates are cleared.
trans-unit.target: 当你将分配日期的数组时，任何预先存在的日期都被清除。

trans-unit.source: Example
trans-unit.target: 示例

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is redrawn.
trans-unit.target: 在重绘控件时发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> control sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles.UserPaint> bit flag to `false`, so the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> will not raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.Paint> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>控件将设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles.UserPaint>位标志设为`false`，因此<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>不会引发<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.Paint>事件。

trans-unit.source: To provide a custom look to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> control, you should override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPrint%2A> method, call the base implementation of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPrint%2A>, and then perform custom painting.
trans-unit.target: 若要提供自定义信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>控件，应重写<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPrint%2A>方法，调用基实现的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPrint%2A>，然后执行自定义绘制。

trans-unit.source: Removes all the annually bold dates.
trans-unit.target: 移除一年中以粗体显示的所有日期。

trans-unit.source: This method clears all dates from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.AnnuallyBoldedDates%2A> array.
trans-unit.target: 此方法清除中的所有日期<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.AnnuallyBoldedDates%2A>数组。

trans-unit.source: To remove a single date from the bold dates, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.RemoveAnnuallyBoldedDate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要删除单个日期以粗体显示的日期，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.RemoveAnnuallyBoldedDate%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: You must call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.UpdateBoldedDates%2A> method to ensure that the display is updated to reflect the removal.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control is laid out from right to left.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示控件是否采用从右到左的布局。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the control is laid out from right to left; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果控件从右到左布局则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.RightToLeftLayout%2A> property is useful for international applications where the language is written from right to left.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.RightToLeftLayout%2A>属性都很有用国际应用程序语言写入从右到左的位置。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.RightToLeftLayout%2A> properties are both `true`,
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.RightToLeftLayout%2A>属性均`true`，

trans-unit.source: Mirroring will be turned on for the form, and control placement and text will be from right to left.
trans-unit.target: 镜像将打开窗体，并且控件放置和文本将为从右到左。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.RightToLeftLayout" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.RightToLeftLayout" /> 属性的值更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the scroll rate for a month calendar control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置月历控件的滚动率。

trans-unit.source: A positive number representing the current scroll rate in number of months moved.
trans-unit.target: 用移动的月份数表示当前滚动率的正数。

trans-unit.source: The default is the number of months currently displayed.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是当前显示的月份数。

trans-unit.source: The maximum is 20,000.
trans-unit.target: 最大数目为 20,000。

trans-unit.source: The scroll rate is the number of months that the control moves its display when the user clicks a scroll arrow.
trans-unit.target: 控件移动显示，当用户单击滚动箭头的月份数的滚动率。

trans-unit.source: If this value is 0, the number of months is reset to the default, which is the number of months displayed in the control.
trans-unit.target: 如果此值为 0，则会将的月数重置为默认情况下，在控件中显示的月份数。

trans-unit.source: The maximum value is 20,000.
The following code example displays a form containing a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> control that displays one calendar year.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例显示一个窗体包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>显示一个日历年的控件。

trans-unit.source: The example demonstrates setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TitleBackColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TitleForeColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.CalendarDimensions%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TrailingForeColor%2A> properties to customize the look of the calendar control.
trans-unit.target: 该示例演示了如何设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TitleBackColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TitleForeColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.CalendarDimensions%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TrailingForeColor%2A>可自定义日历控件的外观属性。

trans-unit.source: Other properties such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.AnnuallyBoldedDates%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.BoldedDates%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MonthlyBoldedDates%2A> are set to customize which dates are bold.
trans-unit.target: 其他属性，如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.AnnuallyBoldedDates%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.BoldedDates%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MonthlyBoldedDates%2A>设置为自定义的日期将以粗体显示。

trans-unit.source: The example also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.FirstDayOfWeek%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxDate%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MinDate%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A> properties to change the calendar format.
trans-unit.target: 该示例还将<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.FirstDayOfWeek%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxDate%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MinDate%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A>属性来更改日历格式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateSelected> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateChanged> events are also handled and their status is displayed on the form.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateSelected>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateChanged>还处理事件，并在窗体上显示其状态。

trans-unit.source: The value is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: 值小于 0。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The value is greater than 20,000.
Gets or sets the end date of the selected range of dates.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置选定日期范围的结束日期。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> indicating the last date in the selection range.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />，指示选择范围中的最后日期。

trans-unit.source: If you set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A> property to a date that is earlier than the current value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A> property, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A> is automatically set equal to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果你设置的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A>属性设置为早于的当前值的日期<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A>属性，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A>自动设置为等于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If you set a date in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A> that causes the selection to exceed the number of days specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A> property, the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A> is adjusted; <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A> is automatically set so that the number of days selected is equal to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果在中设置日期<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A>，从而导致超过指定天数的选择<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A>属性、 的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A>调整;<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A>自动集以便的天数选择等于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A> represents the number of days in the selection, not the difference between <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A> 表示所选内容，不之间的差异的最大天数<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For example, if <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A> is 7 (the default), then <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A> can be no more than six days apart.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A>是 7 （默认值），然后<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A>之间能不能超过六天。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionRange%2A> for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> control that has visual styles enabled will result in the selection range not painting correctly on the control.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionRange%2A>为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>已启用视觉样式的控件将导致不绘制在控件上的正确选择范围。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A>属性。

trans-unit.target: 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴到一个窗体包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>控件名为`MonthCalendar1`，并调用`ShowAWeeksVacationOneMonthFromToday`从窗体的构造函数的方法或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load>事件处理方法。

trans-unit.source: The date value is less than the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MinDate" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 日期值小于 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MinDate" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The date value is greater than the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxDate" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 日期值大于 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxDate" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the selected range of dates for a month calendar control.
trans-unit.target: 为月历控件获取或设置选定的日期范围。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange" /> with the start and end dates of the selected range.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange" />，带有选定范围的开始日期和结束日期。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property is functionally equivalent to using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SetSelectionRange%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性在功能上等效于使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SetSelectionRange%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: You can set the start and end dates separately by setting either the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过设置分别设置开始和结束日期<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: You cannot change the start and end dates by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property values of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionRange%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你无法通过设置更改的开始和结束日期<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性值的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionRange%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: You should use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SetSelectionRange%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 应使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A>，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SetSelectionRange%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A> property value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange> is greater than its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A> property value, the dates are swapped; the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A> property value becomes the starting date, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A> property value becomes the end date.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A>属性值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange>大于其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A>属性值，将交换日期;<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A>属性值将成为开始日期，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A>属性值将成为结束日期。

trans-unit.source: Scrolling through the calendar display with the navigation buttons when a range is selected can cause unexpected results (for example, the date range is not preserved).
trans-unit.target: 滚动显示日历导航按钮，选择一个范围时可能会导致意外的结果 （例如，日期范围不会保留）。

trans-unit.source: If you have a single month displayed with a range of 04/01/2001 to 04/10/2001, scrolling the calendar to March changes the selected range as follows: 03/01/2001 to 03/10/2001.
trans-unit.target: 如果你有单个月份与 04/01/2001 到 2001-04-10 范围一起显示，滚动到年 3 月的日历，如下所示更改所选的范围： 03/01/2001 到 2001-03-10。

trans-unit.source: If you have multiple months displayed, such as March and April with a selected range of 04/01/2001 to 04/10/2001, scrolling the calendar back to January and February changes the selected range as follows: 01/01/2001 to 01/10/2001.
trans-unit.target: 如果你有多个月份显示，例如年 3 月和年 4 月并且选定日期范围的 04/01/2001 到 04/10/2001，滚动回年 1 月和年 2 月的日历，如下所示更改所选的范围： 01/01/2001 到 2001-01-10。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionRange%2A> for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> control that has visual styles enabled will result in the selection range not painting correctly on the control.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionRange%2A>为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>已启用视觉样式的控件将导致不绘制在控件上的正确选择范围。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start" /> value of the assigned <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange" /> is less than the minimum date allowable for a month calendar control.
trans-unit.target: 所分配的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange" /> 值小于月历控件所允许的最小日期。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start" /> value of the assigned <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange" /> is greater than the maximum allowable date for a month calendar control.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the start date of the selected range of dates.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置所选日期范围的开始日期。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> indicating the first date in the selection range.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />，指示选择范围的第一个日期。

trans-unit.source: If you set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A> property to a date that is later than the current value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A> property, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A> is automatically set equal to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果你设置的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A>属性设置为晚于的当前值的日期<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A>属性，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A>自动设置为等于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If you set a date in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A> that causes the selection to exceed the number of days specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A> property, the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A> is adjusted; <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A> is automatically set so that the number of days selected is equal to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果在中设置日期<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A>，从而导致超过指定天数的选择<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A>属性、 的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A>调整;<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A>自动集以便的天数选择等于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A> represents the number of days in the selection, not the difference between <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A> 表示所选内容，不之间的差异的最大天数<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For example, if <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A> is 7 (the default), then <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A> can be no more than six days apart.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A>是 7 （默认值），然后<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A>之间能不能超过六天。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionRange%2A> for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> control that has visual styles enabled will result in the selection range not painting correctly on the control.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionRange%2A>为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>已启用视觉样式的控件将导致不绘制在控件上的正确选择范围。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: To run the example, paste the following code into a form containing a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> control named `MonthCalendar1`, and call the `ShowAWeeksVacationOneMonthFromToday` method from the form's constructor or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> event-handling method.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴到一个窗体包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>控件名为`MonthCalendar1`，并调用`ShowAWeeksVacationOneMonthFromToday`从窗体的构造函数的方法或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load>事件处理方法。

trans-unit.source: The number of columns.
trans-unit.target: 列数。

trans-unit.source: The number of rows.
trans-unit.target: 行数。

trans-unit.source: Sets the number of columns and rows of months to display.
trans-unit.target: 设置要显示的月份的列数和行数。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of months that you can display is 12, restricted to one calendar year.
trans-unit.target: 最大可以显示的月数为 12，限于一个日历年。

trans-unit.source: The product of the `x` and `y` parameters should be 12 or less.
trans-unit.target: 产品`x`和`y`参数应为 12 或更少。

trans-unit.source: For values of `x` and `y` that have a product of more than 12, the greater of the `x` and `y` values will be iteratively reduced until the product is 12 or less.
trans-unit.target: 值`x`和`y`具有多个 12，较大的那个产品`x`和`y`值将以迭代方式降低产品之前 12 或更少。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="x" /> or <paramref name="y" /> is less than 1.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="x" /> 或 <paramref name="y" /> 小于 1。

trans-unit.source: The date to be selected.
trans-unit.target: 要选择的日期。

trans-unit.source: Sets a date as the currently selected date.
trans-unit.target: 将日期设置为当前选定的日期。

trans-unit.source: This method sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A> and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A> properties to the specified date.
trans-unit.target: 此方法会设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A>与指定的日期属性。

trans-unit.source: This method is the functional equivalent of setting the selection range to a single day through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SetSelectionRange%2A> method or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionRange%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此方法是在功能上等效的设置为一天，通过选择范围<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SetSelectionRange%2A>方法或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionRange%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The value is less than the minimum allowable date.
trans-unit.target: 值小于允许的最小日期。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The value is greater than the maximum allowable date.
trans-unit.target: 值大于允许的最大日期。

trans-unit.source: This exception will only be thrown if <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MinDate" /> or <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxDate" /> have been set explicitly.
trans-unit.target: 只有在已显式设置了 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MinDate" /> 或 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxDate" /> 的情况下，才会引发此异常。

trans-unit.source: The beginning date of the selection range.
trans-unit.target: 选择范围的开始日期。

trans-unit.source: The end date of the selection range.
trans-unit.target: 选择范围的结束日期。

trans-unit.source: Sets the selected dates in a month calendar control to the specified date range.
trans-unit.target: 将月历控件中的选定日期设置为指定的日期范围。

trans-unit.source: Using this method is functionally equivalent to setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionRange%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法在功能上等效于设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionRange%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: You can set the start and end dates separately by setting either the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过设置分别设置开始和结束日期<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If you set the `date1` parameter greater than the `date2` parameter, both dates are set to the `date1` value.
trans-unit.target: 如果你设置`date1`参数大于`date2`参数，这两个日期设置为`date1`值。

trans-unit.source: Scrolling through the calendar display with the navigation buttons when a range is selected can cause unexpected results (for example, the date range is not preserved).
trans-unit.target: 滚动显示日历导航按钮，选择一个范围时可能会导致意外的结果 （例如，日期范围不会保留）。

trans-unit.source: If you have a single month displayed with a range of 04/01/2001 to 04/10/2001, scrolling the calendar back changes the selected range as follows: 03/01/2001 to 03/10/2001.
trans-unit.target: 如果你有单个月份与 04/01/2001 到 2001-04-10 范围一起显示，滚动日历回滚更改所选的范围，如下所示： 03/01/2001 到 2001-03-10。

trans-unit.source: If you have multiple months displayed, such as March and April with a selected range of 04/01/2001 to 04/10/2001, scrolling the calendar back to January and February changes the selected range as follows: 01/01/2001 to 01/10/2001.
trans-unit.target: 如果你有多个月份显示，例如年 3 月和年 4 月并且选定日期范围的 04/01/2001 到 04/10/2001，滚动回年 1 月和年 2 月的日历，如下所示更改所选的范围： 01/01/2001 到 2001-01-10。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionRange%2A> for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> control that has visual styles enabled will result in the selection range not painting correctly on the control.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionRange%2A>为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>已启用视觉样式的控件将导致不绘制在控件上的正确选择范围。
